sentences_texts: (I will say, the waitress was very sweet and did try to compensate for the chef and owner's poor beh- we gave waitress a big tip). aspect: waitress
2 weeks ago, I decided to set up a birthday dinner in this establishment and was wary with the reviews I've read in City Search but scene seems to be a perfect scene. aspect: scene
After being ignored by our waiter we complained to the manager manager assured us everything would improve. aspect: manager
After our meal,the manager, even took some of manager time to sit with us and give us a lesson in Sake 101. aspect: manager
Also, they upped their prices, so I have their old menu, and was surprised when my bill came to over $5 more than bill used to (I know, not a huge deal). aspect: bill
Anyway we get a table and order some appetizers from one of the waitresses waitresses was pleasently nice. aspect: waitresses
Asked for wine recommendations and the waitress told me waitress favorites and described them in detail - I don't encounter this much in NYC. aspect: waitress
Bernard is a great host; it didn't bother me a bit that host recited the entire menu to my wife. aspect: host
but the Server informed us that they wanted to make the soup their own and that Server hopes we like it. aspect: Server
but the Server informed us that they wanted to make the soup their own and that she hopes we like soup  aspect: soup

dinner on 1st floor (street level) a bit noisy, 2nd floor has bed-style seating that is good for dessert drinks (do not attempt to have entree on the bed, what a mess dinner will be trying to eat rice dishes with sauce while half-lying down). aspect: dinner
Especially the manager or host host kept walking by and giving us the evil eye to see the progress of our dinner so they could turn the table over to other customers. aspect: host
Especially the manager or host who kept walking by and giving us the evil eye to see the progress of our dinner so host could turn the table over to other customers. aspect: host
Especially the manager or host manager kept walking by and giving us the evil eye to see the progress of our dinner so they could turn the table over to other customers. aspect: manager
Especially the manager or host who kept walking by and giving us the evil eye to see the progress of our dinner so manager could turn the table over to other customers. aspect: manager
got the guac but no drinks until guac was all gone (approximately 20 minutes later). aspect: guac
Got the scoop on this new hot spot and decided to give spot shot for a client dinner. aspect: spot
Had the calamari app, app TGIFriday's makes better, and the scallop ceviche - that is NOT ceviche! aspect: calamari app
Had the calamari app, ceviche TGIFriday's makes better, and the scallop ceviche - that is NOT ceviche! aspect: scallop ceviche
However when the party was complete we had the other waitress come over waitress said that we had to order all the food at once and couldnt order just appetizers. aspect: waitress
I always listen to the waiters' recommendations, because they're always awesome - either a special or just one of waiters faves off the menu. aspect: waiters

I couple of weeks ago we went to Supper in the east village and food was so bad that we got up and left and the only way to save the evening of horrible food was to go to Blue Ribbon Bakery and have at least one thing off the menu. aspect: food

I don't remember the dessert item but when dessert was brought out flashing lights overhead threw colored beams on the walls and a young waiter came over to our table and did a little dance that was Bollywood MTV for the East Village set. aspect: dessert
I go bar to eat dinner, brunch, or to just drink and hang out at the bar with the friendly staff. aspect: bar
i got a steak special that was way overpriced ($12 more then the steak on the menu and no warning from the waitress) and special was cooked to the wrong temperature. aspect: steak special
I love the food here, and although it is pricey, the entree comes with rice, naan, dal, and salad, dal makes it worthwhile. aspect: dal
I love the food here, and although it is pricey, the entree comes with rice, naan, dal, and salad, naan makes it worthwhile. aspect: naan
I love the food here, and although it is pricey, the entree comes with rice, naan, dal, and salad, salad makes it worthwhile. aspect: salad
I told the waiter that my drink tasted very bad and asked if he could swap drink out for a Petron Margarita. aspect: drink
I told the waiter that my drink tasted very bad and asked if waiter could swap it out for a Petron Margarita. aspect: waiter

I was told(very snottily) no, but then not even 10 minutes later another group of people came in, asked the same thing and because the same woman waiter knew them waiter gave them regular menus! aspect: waiter
I'd recommend getting an appetizer b/c the dinner takes a bit to be cooked, but dinner was definitely worth the wait. aspect: dinner
If you don't care about the wait staff as long as staff bring you your drinks and dinner, then go to Opa. aspect: wait staff
impressive balcony seating and while maitre forgot to give us the cold appetizers, the waiter and maitre'd more than made up for it by being most accomodating to us. aspect: maitre
impressive balcony seating and while waiter forgot to give us the cold appetizers, the waiter and maitre'd more than made up for it by being most accomodating to us. aspect: waiter
it's a very chill spot to hang with a group, I went spot with a bunch of my friends to have drinks for my birthday and we all had a great time. aspect: spot

My ceasar salad amounted to some limp lettuce and mayo strewn around a large plate, and the only way I might have died for the mac and cheese is due to natural causes while waiting for cheese to arrive. aspect: mac and cheese

My only complaint was that when I tried to go back with some friends on a crowded night, the place was packed, yet place told us there was a 20 minute wait and that we should wait at the bar. aspect: place
My party felt like we got put in a dining room for tourist, room must have been the penalty box area for the disgruntled wait staff on duty. aspect: dining room

My vegetable Napoleon was good; although i first got the veggie burger because the waitress mis-heard and stood my friend up for another 15 minutes of waiting to have Napoleon served. aspect: vegetable Napoleon
Not including the tip for our server, server we saw twice in an hour? aspect: server

Ok I got the edamame and something from the sushi chef for free, but the quality of food is more important to me than a free small dish (maybe that's why the restaurant gives dish to attact new customers. aspect: dish

On Friday night the busboy was sulky verging on rude; he brought the fries (ordered for the entrees) twice before the appetizers came and then again the minute we'd finished appetizers and looked put out to be asked to take the empty plates away. aspect: appetizers
One of our diners didn't like her fish and both the waitress and the manager insisted on replacing fish  aspect: fish
One would think we'd get an apology or complimentary drinks - instead, we got a snobby waiter wouldn't even take our order for 15 minutes and gave us lip when we asked waiter to do so. aspect: waiter
Our waiter never once asked how everything was, as I suspect waiter knew the kitchen was producing seriously average food. aspect: waiter
Our waiter was a little stressed and brought a couple things out late and as a result, waiter apologized graciously and gave us wine on the house to compensate for the delay. aspect: waiter
Our waitress was a bit cold but waitress was still attentive and food came quickly. aspect: waitress
Our waitress was very nice, not snotty - waitress even gave us a free apertif after the meal (and left the bottle on the table). aspect: waitress
service was attentive at the beginning but the waiter lost us towards the end and we had to flag waiter down for the check. aspect: waiter

Snack on a bowl of fried chickpeas while you browse the menu, then move onto the tender lamb skewers, skewers arrive atop a slab of French bread, perfectly poised to catch the meat's sweet drippings. aspect: lamb skewers

So are cooked plates: Marinated Kobe beef practically melts on beef skewers, soy-buttered scallops collapse with sweet brine and Chawanmushi custard, quivering in eel-soy broth with black truffles and foie gras, is over the top. aspect: Marinated Kobe beef
So inexpensive that you'd wonder about the sanity of the owners, if owners weren't such good cooks. aspect: owners
The appetizer came out cold and the waiter came and took appetizer to the kitchen. aspect: appetizer
The bill came out to like $100pp, and noone touched their food, and drinks were left untouched because after the first bite/sip you want to never touch drinks again. aspect: drinks
The bill came out to like $100pp, and noone touched their food, and drinks were left untouched because after the first bite/sip you want to never touch food again. aspect: food
The Black Duck is a great date place, whether going for dinner or just for a drink at Duck huge, antique-ish bar. aspect: Black Duck
The busboys were more helpful than my server server then made me wait at the bar (very crowded with what appeared to be tasty margaritas) to pay the bartender - what's that about? aspect: server

The defining characteristic of this popular restaurant, aside from dirt-cheap hot dogs, is the beverage selection, selection includes a light and refreshing papaya juice, an extremely sweet pineapple juice and a sweet and frothy pina colada drink. aspect: beverage selection
The Food Regulars swear by the tamales, tamales are spongy, well-seasoned and pulled from steaming crocks on the counter. aspect: tamales
The Food The classic Italian menu gets off to a good start with Queen's famous bread basket, bread is loaded with a slew of crunchy, yeasty homemade varieties. aspect: bread
The food was good (and the $25 prix fixe made food all that much better), but the dinner started to feel like an assembly line when our appetizer arrived 5 minutes after ordering. aspect: food
The food was pretty good, but due to our large size (~16) the manager asked us to limit our appetizers to just 3 selections b/c manager didn't want to overburden his cooks. aspect: manager
The food was pretty good, but due to our large size (~16) the manager asked us to limit our appetizers to just 3 selections b/c he didn't want to overburden manager cooks. aspect: manager

The hostess was condescending and the waiter was somewhat absent and unaccomodating (sure, we made a reservation to sit outside but when I asked to be moved indoors after I heard thunder waiter didn't even try to make it happen, giving me a blank stare and a shrug when I asked what we would do if it rained). aspect: waiter
The hostess was totally not accomadating, and even though there were empty tables hostess still didn't seat us! aspect: hostess

The lunch got a little bizarre when we asked the waiter how the joint got it's name, and waiter made his hands into cups in reference to placing them on a woman's breasts and said, No, not this. aspect: waiter

The lunch got a little bizarre when we asked the waiter how the joint got it's name, and he made waiter hands into cups in reference to placing them on a woman's breasts and said, No, not this. aspect: waiter
The manager claimed that manager could not compensate us for anything on the bill which just shows the lack of sophistication from the entire group. aspect: manager
The only dishes that were good were the chicken kebob (not hard to make) and the desserts, pudding were rice pudding. aspect: rice pudding
The only redeeming factor of the night was the dessert dessert was very good but certainly not worth the cost of an overall horible experience. aspect: dessert
The piano guy isn't there all the time, but when piano is it's a great addition to the meal. aspect: piano

The place was packed and while our food took time to be prepared, our waiter earned points for waiter sparkling conversation to pass time and for also knowing practically every ingredient of every special under consideration. aspect: waiter
The Scene Hunky waiters dub diners darling and it sounds like waiters mean it. aspect: waiters
The server was so busy the night we visited that server forgot to put in our food order. aspect: server
The servers were snobby and got mad at me when I asked if servers serve by the slice. aspect: servers
The service was non-existant, the manager spent all of manager time at the bar. aspect: manager
The space is grand with a very high ceiling although space is one of those places that they keep so dark you are not really sure what you are eating anyway. aspect: space
The space was so fantastic that once we heard they were serving dinner we decided to go one night and try dinner out. aspect: serving dinner

The trick to the tomato and onions is ask for onions light on the onions, heavy on the tomatoes, order steak for one less person than you have in your party and if the steak is too rare, you can cook the individual pieces more by placing them on the platter around the edges. aspect: tomato and onions
The waiter knew about every item on the menu and explained menu very well. aspect: menu
The waiter made a huge production over what order waiter should deliver the food, as we all agreed the miso should be eaten with the sushi to aid digestion. aspect: waiter
The waiters have been there for YEARS and waiters know their steak is amazing. aspect: waiters
The waiters have been there for YEARS and they know waiters steak is amazing. aspect: waiters

The waitress was no where to be found at all throughout the course of the meal, did not refill a single drink nor did waitress bother to inquire about my satisfaction with the food or even bring the check at the conclusion of the meal. aspect: waitress
Their bagels have the perfect softness to them, but on the outside there's a bit of crispiness to give bagels a bit of texture. aspect: bagels
then the manager gave us lemon juice instead of ceasar dressing for a ceasar salad juice ruined the salad. aspect: lemon juice
There are no price listed in the menu, and price will not provid them with a smile. aspect: price
They crumbed the table once, although table was soiled the entire meal. aspect: table
They have possibly the worst service in New York I have waited until the waiter has finished waiter paper, begged for water and waited over an hour for my meal. aspect: waiter
This happened while many diners were enjoying diners meal and it was rudes. aspect: diners

This much heralded restaurant brought my wife and I some excitement as we walked in the door, but we were met with an awkward maitre'd maitre barely spoke to us at all and just seemed standoff-ish. aspect: maitre
This was not the same hostess I usually see there hostess happens to be very sweet and provides excellent service. aspect: hostess
To both our surprise, this inquiry was interpreted as a personal offense by the waiter waiter told my wife to leave the store if she didnt want the pastries. aspect: waiter
very nice servers, but servers seemed more interested in conversing with the regulars than bringing food and being attentive. aspect: servers
Watch out for the overworked, stressed out waitress who dumps tapa dishes on the table and leaves w/out announcing what dishes is. aspect: dishes
Watch out for the overworked, stressed out waitress waitress dumps tapa dishes on the table and leaves w/out announcing what it is. aspect: waitress

we all liked the brunch items we had but when we later asked if the chips were supposed to come with the meal, the waitress explained it away by saying sometimes waitress forget instead of apologizing and offering something extra. aspect: waitress
We finally flagged down another server who brought us more to drink, and then server took forever with the check. aspect: server
We finally flagged down another server server brought us more to drink, and then they took forever with the check. aspect: server
We initially ordered a bottle of wine and the waitress though we may not like it, so waitress offered us a taste. aspect: waitress
We politely asked our server for the regular menu, but were told that for large parties server could only offer us the banquet menu (would have gone elsewhere had we known). aspect: server

We were directed to a table by a member of staff, table we were then informed was reserved, and lost our seats at the bar, all this after spending upwards of $30 each on very expensive drinks over a two-hour period. aspect: table
We were however seated right away and was immediately told by our waiter that waiter were out of sparking mineral water. aspect: waiter
Went here with my husband on a Saturday night for dinner since the place looked like place had great atmosphere. aspect: place
What do you like more, completely addictive patties of greasy beef, or glasses of cheap refreshing beer to wash beef down? aspect: beef
What do you like more, completely addictive patties of greasy beef, or glasses of cheap refreshing beer to wash patties down? aspect: patties

When I asked the manager to remove the coffee, manager did so without question, but never asked why and never followed up on the issue (she was far too busy flirting with the male waiters). aspect: manager
When I asked the waitress, waitress told me they couldn't afford the salmon, and had changed the dish (though not on the menu). aspect: waitress
When I asked the waitress, she told me waitress couldn't afford the salmon, and had changed the dish (though not on the menu). aspect: waitress
When I called the waitress on it, waitress said that they simply couldn't serve tap water. aspect: waitress
When I called the waitress on it, she said that waitress simply couldn't serve tap water. aspect: waitress
when our server accidentally spilled some wine at our table, server cleaned it up offered us another glass right away. aspect: server
when our server accidentally spilled some wine at our table, he cleaned table up offered us another glass right away. aspect: table
when our server accidentally spilled some wine at our table, he cleaned wine up offered us another glass right away. aspect: wine
When the manager came to our table at the end of the meal and asked how our experience was, I complained to manager about the cold. aspect: manager
When we asked a waiter for an explanation of the long wait with some many empty tables waiter had no answer so we asked for the manager. aspect: waiter
While dining on a delicate lamb carpaccio, and grilled skate wing, the owner explained that due to low lunch-time patronage, owner may be discontinuing lunch altogether. aspect: owner

While the staff was kind and attentive, our waiter never once broke a smile, even when I told waiter it was my friend's birthday, although he did bring a dessert with a candle at the end of the meal. aspect: waiter

While the staff was kind and attentive, our waiter never once broke a smile, even when I told him it was my friend's birthday, although waiter did bring a dessert with a candle at the end of the meal. aspect: waiter
The first time the sushi was outstanding, the second time sushi was a little bland. aspect: sushi
The first time the sushi was outstanding, the second time sushi was a little bland. aspect: sushi
I ordered the smoked salmon and roe appetizer and appetizer was off flavor. aspect: smoked salmon and roe appetizer
The cold appetizer dishes taste like the way I remember dishes to taste when I was growing up in Taiwan. aspect: cold appetizer dishes
The rice was poor quality and was cooked so badly rice was hard. aspect: rice
Winnie and Winnie staff are the best crew you can find serving you. aspect: Winnie
I did not try the caviar but I tried salad salmon and crab salad (they are all good) aspect: crab salad
I did not try the caviar but I tried salmon salmon and crab salad (they are all good) aspect: salmon
Its location is good and the fact that Hutner College is near and Suan prices are very reasonable, makes students go back to Suan again and again. aspect: Suan
I choose to go with one of the special, the braised lamb shank in red wine, wine was excellent. aspect: braised lamb shank in red wine
Their bagels are fine, but bagels are a little overcooked, and not really a 'special' bagel experience. aspect: bagels
Small servings for main entree, i had salmon (wasnt impressed) girlfriend had chicken, chicken was good. aspect: chicken
The restaurant has a Family feel, not least with regard to the portions portions are enormous; the veal alone could have single-handedly solved third world famine. aspect: portions
Still, any quibbles about the bill were off-set by the pour-your-own measures of liquers liquers were courtesey of the house... aspect: measures of liquers
I recently tried Suan and I thought that Suan was great. aspect: Suan
It was the first place we ate on our first trip to New York, and place will be the last place we stop as we head out of town on our next trip to New York. aspect: place
I have been to Rao's probably 15 times the past 3 years and Rao's keeps getting better. aspect: Rao's
I got the $10 10-piece dim sum combo, every bite of combo was great. aspect: $10 10-piece dim sum combo
You must have the crabmeat lasagna lasagna is out of this world and the chocolate bread pudding for dessert. aspect: crabmeat lasagna
whoever the jazz duo was, duo were on POINT. aspect: jazz duo
If you don't mind pre-sliced low quality fish, unfriendly staff and a sushi chef that looks like chef is miserable then this is your place. aspect: sushi chef

Wasn't going to share but I feel obligated...while sitting at the sushi bar dining we watched the chef accidentally drop a piece of Unagi on the floor and upon retrieving it from the floor proceed to use the piece in the delivery order chef was preparing. aspect: chef
This place, place is only a few months old, is perhaps Queens' biggest secret! aspect: place

With so many good restaurants on the UWS, I don't need overpriced food, absurdly arrogant wait-staff wait-staff don't recognize they work at a glorified diner, clumsy service, and management that doesn't care. aspect: wait-staff
Although place do the typical what kind of water would you like questions the service was good and overall very relaxing to place to eat. aspect: place
Never have I had such dramatic delivery guys (a lot of huffing and panting and muttering under breath b/c I live in a walkup) who always seem disappointed with guys tips. aspect: delivery guys
Never have I had such dramatic delivery guys (a lot of huffing and panting and muttering under breath b/c I live in a walkup) guys always seem disappointed with their tips. aspect: delivery guys
We were 4 and got the family size penne a la vodka vodka was tremendously gigantic portion...a bucket of food literally. aspect: penne a la vodka
La Rosa waltzes in, and I think Rosa are doing it the best. aspect: La Rosa
I found spot on a cold night, the perfect spot to warm up. aspect: spot

I've also been amazed at all the new additions in the past few years: A new Jazz Bar, the most fantastic Dining Garden, the Best Thin Crust Pizzas, and now a Lasagna Menu Menu is to die for (these are not your average lasagnas)! aspect: Lasagna Menu
We, there were four of us, arrived at noon - the place was empty - and the staff acted like we were imposing on them and staff were very rude. aspect: staff
We, there were four of us, arrived at noon - the place was empty - and the staff acted like we were imposing on staff and they were very rude. aspect: staff
Ive asked a cart attendant for a lotus leaf wrapped rice and attendant replied back rice and just walked away. aspect: cart attendant
I had never had Edamame pureed before but I thought pureed was innovative and tasty (could've used a bit more salt). aspect: Edamame pureed
The decor is night tho...but place REALLY need to clean that vent in the ceiling...its quite un-appetizing, and kills your effort to make this place look sleek and modern. aspect: place
I tend to judge a sushi restaurant by its sea urchin, urchin was heavenly at sushi rose. aspect: sea urchin
$6 and there is much tasty food, all of food fresh and continually refilled. aspect: food
Also, specify if you like your food spicy- food rather bland if you don't. aspect: food
This tiny restaurant is as cozy as restaurant gets, with that certain Parisian flair. aspect: restaurant
This place is the most Japanese place can ever get. aspect: place
I went there for lunch and lunch was not as good as I expected from the reviews I read. aspect: lunch
Planet Thailand has always been a hit with me , I go Thailand usually for the sushi, which is great , the thai food is excellent too . aspect: Planet Thailand
Planet Thailand has always been a hit with me , I go there usually for the sushi, sushi is great , the thai food is excellent too . aspect: sushi
but when we looked at the menu, there weren't a lot of choices, most of menu were dumplings in the appetizer section. aspect: menu
Try the crunchy tuna, tuna is to die for. aspect: crunchy tuna
The Steak Tartare is a great bet, they fix Tartare for you at the table. aspect: Steak Tartare
It may be a bit packed on weekends, but the vibe is good and food is the best French food you will find in the area. aspect: French food
Tiny dessert was $8.00...just plain overpriced for what dessert is. aspect: dessert
Try their chef's specials-- specials are to die for. aspect: chef's specials
Wait staff is blantently unappreciative of your business but pie the best pie on the UWS! aspect: pie
When I lived upstate for a while I would buy freeze the bagels and bagels would still be better than any else. aspect: bagels
Worth visiting the 1st Ave spot because spot is the original store. aspect: 1st Ave spot
He served me an Uni Hand roll, roll I never had before, and let me tell you...IT WAS HEAVEN! aspect: Uni Hand roll
I've been to at Cafe Spice probably 5-8 times, Spice is probably still the best Indian restaurant around Union Square. aspect: Cafe Spice
The decor is vibrant and eye-pleasing with several semi-private boths on the right side of the dining hall, boths are great for a date. aspect: semi-private boths
The have over 100 different beers to offer thier guest so that made my husband very happy and the food was delicious, if I must recommend a dish food must be the pumkin tortelini. aspect: food
I have to highly recommend the lobster roll - not to much mayo; you can tell roll was a fresh lobster. aspect: lobster roll
We had Pam's special fried fish and fish was amazing. aspect: Pam's special fried fish
They have food all -- great price, food, and service. aspect: food
They have service all -- great price, food, and service. aspect: service
The atmosphere is noisy and the waiters are literally walking around doing things as fast as waiters can. aspect: waiters
And congee all comes at a very reasonable price (congee, noodles, and rice dishes are no more than $3-6 each). aspect: congee
And noodles all comes at a very reasonable price (congee, noodles, and rice dishes are no more than $3-6 each). aspect: noodles
And dishes all comes at a very reasonable price (congee, noodles, and rice dishes are no more than $3-6 each). aspect: rice dishes
We both opted for a pasta dish and dish were served timely and fresh. aspect: pasta dish
We even had a visit from the Manager Manager wanted to make sure we were enjoying ourselves. aspect: Manager
My friend got the mushroom pizza pizza tasted better. aspect: mushroom pizza
Kind of a small place but I guess if place are not too busy might be able to fit a group or kids. aspect: place
I started out with a Bombay beer beer was big enough for two. aspect: Bombay beer
To be completely fair, the only redeeming factor was the food, food was above average, but couldn't make up for all the other deficiencies of Teodora. aspect: food
Cute place, nice wait staff but would never go place again. aspect: place
Cute place, nice wait staff but would never go place again. aspect: place
Myagi is one of my favorite restaurants in the City; the place the negative reviews describe sound like Myagi were somewhere else. aspect: Myagi
No gimmicks here -- the food speaks for itself in food freshness and preparation. aspect: food
The service was impeccable and unobtrusive -- the staff knows what staff are there to do -- to know their menu, present your meal, and attend to your needs. aspect: staff
The service was impeccable and unobtrusive -- the staff knows what they are there to do -- to know staff menu, present your meal, and attend to your needs. aspect: staff
My boyfriend had the New England Chowder Chowder was good but I think the award should go to the Lobster Bisque. aspect: New England Chowder
My boyfriend had Prime Rib Rib was good . aspect: Prime Rib
We didn't want a bottle of bubbly on a weekday so we each got little bottles of Korbett Korbett was just enough. aspect: bottles of Korbett
With the exception of our lemon salad that had so much pepper on salad that our eyes started watering, the food here was decent, not great. aspect: lemon salad
We ordered the special, grilled branzino, that was so infused with bone, branzino was difficult to eat. aspect: grilled branzino
The food was pretty tradional but food was hot and good with large portions. aspect: food
The atmosphere is nothing special, but atmosphere feels like a Sushi establishment in Tokyo. aspect: atmosphere
The hostess and the waitress were incredibly rude and did everything hostess could to rush us out. aspect: hostess
The hostess and the waitress were incredibly rude and did everything waitress could to rush us out. aspect: waitress
Don't dine at Tamarind for the vegetarian dishes, dishes are simply not up to par with the non-veg selections. aspect: vegetarian dishes
the only things u could really taste are the very salty soy sauce (even sauce low sodium), the vinegar-soaked rice, and the scallion on top of the fish. aspect: soy sauce
Both times I was extremely dissappointed by the service, service was boarderline rude. aspect: service
I had their eggs benedict for brunch, which were the worst in my entire life, I tried removing the hollondaise sauce completely that was how failed benedict was. aspect: eggs benedict
I had their eggs benedict for brunch, benedict were the worst in my entire life, I tried removing the hollondaise sauce completely that was how failed it was. aspect: eggs benedict
Try the Pad Thai, it's fabulous and Thai prices are so cheap! aspect: Pad Thai
It's a rather cramped and busy restaurant and restaurant closes early. aspect: restaurant

When my dessert came, there was a candle in it - not because anyone asked for one - but because the waiter must have seen me opening my birthday card and gift, and said waiter knew it was a special occassion of some sort. aspect: waiter
I almost hesititate to write a review because the atmosphere was so great and I would hate for atmosphere too become to crowded. aspect: atmosphere
The wait staff is very freindly, staff make it feel like you're eating in a freindly little european town. aspect: wait staff
I like Cafe Noir dont get me wrong, it is jsut that the people who work Noir are evil and incompetent!! aspect: Cafe Noir
I like Cafe Noir dont get me wrong, it is jsut that the people people work there are evil and incompetent!! aspect: people

After dinner the manager grabbed my boyfriend, asked him: Where are you from...maybe you dont know how things work in America...and in the end stormed away almost teareyed yelling that tips are the only thing manager survive on. aspect: manager
I also ordered the Change Mojito, Mojito was out of this world. aspect: Change Mojito
My friends settled for rice dishes, but we came back the following day to try the dim sum, sum was good...not outstanding, but good. aspect: dim sum
We ate out in the back patio, which is worth patio as it's cool and the music is hear well there. aspect: back patio
We ate out in the back patio, patio is worth it as it's cool and the music is hear well there. aspect: back patio
My son and his girlfriend both wanted cheeseburgers and cheeseburgers were huge! aspect: cheeseburgers
This place is really trendi but place have forgotten about the most important part of a restaurant, the food. aspect: place
We had the lobster sandwich and sandwich was FANTASTIC. aspect: lobster sandwich
We had the scallops as an appetizer and scallops were delicious and the sauce was wonderful. aspect: scallops
